dialogues.text: Hello there. Would you like to hear about our town's history?
Upon arrival, a group of miners found a plethora of rich mineral veins under this green paradise.
After their first expedition into the mines, some of them had fallen ill. Not knowing the cause, it seemed like a hopeless situation.
One of them decided to look for medicinal herbs in the nearby forest. He returned with a handful shamrocks and the stew he made out of them, cured the miners.
Hence, the town's name stems from the green colour of shamrocks.
